contents.text: Welcome to Gainsight on the Peninsula, empowering you to boost revenue, reduce customer churn, and drive customer advocacy.
For sales and pricing inquiries, press 1.
To schedule a product demo, press 1.
Connecting you to our demo scheduling team, please hold.

navigationGoals: Schedule a product demo to review the platform’s features next week
I’d like to book a demo of your platform to see how it can support my veteran-focused nonprofit.
Schedule a technical deep-dive demo of Gainsight’s integration and API capabilities.
I need help scheduling a product demo.
I want to schedule a detailed product demo to assess Gainsight's capabilities and pricing.

contents.text: To speak with a sales representative, press 2.
Connecting you with a sales representative, please hold.

navigationGoals: Connect with a sales rep to discuss pricing tiers and contract details
I need to talk to someone about pricing plans and any nonprofit or veteran discounts available.
Connect with a sales consultant to review enterprise licensing and pricing tiers.
I want to speak with a sales representative about pricing.
I need to speak with a sales representative to discuss licensing options and volume discounts.

contents.text: For customer success solutions and support, press 2.
To learn how to reduce customer churn, press 1.
Connecting you to our customer success experts, please hold.

navigationGoals: Get expert tips on cutting our customer churn rate
I want advice from your experts on improving engagement and retention for the veterans in our program.
Consult on implementing churn-prediction analytics in our customer success workflow.
I’d like advice on reducing customer churn.
I'm seeking expert guidance on reducing customer churn using customer success best practices.

contents.text: To explore our advocacy and growth strategies, press 2.
Connecting you to our advocacy strategy specialists, please hold.

navigationGoals: Explore how to build and scale customer advocacy programs
I’m looking for strategies to build advocacy and grow our veteran alumni network using your tools.
Get expert advice on architecting a customer advocacy and growth engine with Gainsight.
